# Argus - Modern Next.js Application

## Project Overview
Modern Next.js 14+ application with TypeScript, App Router, Tailwind CSS, shadcn/ui, NextAuth authentication, and Prisma database.

## Tech Stack
- Next.js 14+ (App Router)
- TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS
- shadcn/ui components
- NextAuth.js for authentication
- Prisma ORM
- PostgreSQL database
- ESLint & Prettier

## Development Guidelines
- Use TypeScript for type safety
- Follow Next.js 14 App Router conventions
- Use server components by default
- Implement responsive design
- Support dark mode
- Write clean, maintainable code
